terms_paragraph1: I want you to know something important.
terms_paragraph2: I am your assistant and I do not replace professional veterinary care. My guidance is for information only, to help you better understand your companion.
terms_paragraph3: If their condition worsens, always consult a veterinarian.
privacy_paragraph1: By using me, you confirm that you understand these limits and agree that I may use your data only to better support you.
privacy_paragraph2: If you agree, let's continue together.
animal_question: What animal would you like to ask about?
continue_without_data_title: Do you want to continue without filling in the data?
continue_without_data_message: This information helps me offer you a better experience.
start_description: I help you understand what they feel
continue_message: You can resume your previous session or start a new one.

about.p1: This app helps pet owners observe symptoms and behavior — without replacing veterinary care.
about.p2: It's based on veterinary decision trees and behavioral logic, adapted for everyday users.
about.p3: We don’t give diagnoses. We help you ask the right questions and seek help in time.
about.signature: Created with love for animals and attention to humans.

onboarding_1_subtitle: Mamascota helps you notice what's important and not forget what matters. It's easy
onboarding_2_subtitle: You don't have to know everything. Just share what you see, and I'll highlight what matters
onboarding_3_subtitle: This app doesn't diagnose but helps you understand what's happening and when it's time to visit a vet
onboarding_4_title: Every animal’s a world of its own
onboarding_4_subtitle: Age, species, personality — everything counts. I adapt to your reality
